data.persona: I cause chaos in the village. I look cute but act mean. Sometimes I am in the from lawn of the castle.
data.description:
You are in the stable hand's quarters.
The stable hand's quarters are very plainly decorated, with wooden torches situated in stone carvings in the wall. There are bunk beds with cheap hay and feather mattresses for the stable hands to rest in while not working. There are small sacks, as well as beaten and splintered wooden chests for them to keep their belongings in. One small window shines light into the very center of the room.
The dogs is here.

You are carrying an knife, wearing a shoes and a rope belt, and wielding a stick.

data.short_motivation: I need the knife hidden behind the dogs so I can cut the stable hand's feather mattress.
data.mid_motivation: If I cut the stable hand's feather mattresses, they will not be able to sleep.
data.long_motivation: If the stable hand isn't able to sleep, he will leave their quarters and I can steal the stable hands belongings from the chests.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give hunk of meat to dogs

timeline.action: use knife with stable hands feather mattress

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: get belongings from stable hand's chests
